description: This file contains the implementation of NoteService class which encapsulates the business logic for managing notes in a notes application. It provides methods for creating, retrieving, listing, updating, and deleting notes, interacting with the NoteRepository layer.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service class providing business logic for notes, including creation, retrieval, listing, updating, and deletion

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note based on the provided request DTO

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a note by its ID, throws NotFoundException if not found

methods.name: listAll
methods.description: Lists all notes, optionally filtered by userId and sorted by last update time

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new data

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by its ID
